GSD.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v4.19.194
GSD.description:
nfc: fix NULL ptr dereference in llcp_sock_getname() after failed connect

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.194 by commit 93e4ac2a9979a9a4ecc158409ed9c3044dc0ae1f, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit d646960f7986fefb460a2b062d5ccc8ccfeacc3a. For more details please see the references link.
